title: Saipem Wins Qatar Offshore EPCI Contract Worth $3.1 Billion
description: Energy services and drilling specialists Saipem SpA and Offshore Oil Engineering Co. Ltd. have been awarded an offshore EPCI contract by QatarEnergy LNG.
content: Energy services and drilling specialists Saipem SpA and Offshore Oil Engineering Co. Ltd. have been awarded an offshore EPCI contract by QatarEnergy LNG.
